overview:
Client relationship manager, website manager & blogger with mylunch.ie, Ireland’s first and best lunch website, designed to help consumers get better value for money by providing them with exclusive lunch deals and voucher offers for lunch retailers in their area.

The blog has a general focus on consumer value but there is also considerable attention given to any quirky, different or impressive initiatives any lunch retailers are running. Interviews with clients (restaurant managers, owners & chefs) as well as consumer feedback also help build a first-hand analysis of current trends and preferences amongst retailers and consumers
